name: Hero Legacy
description:
In a unknown time in a randomly generated realm, a hero spawns out of thin air, to do hero things, with no quest other than his will to do whatever he wills and establish his legacy in the world.

Features:

  • -Procedurally generated open-world
  • -Procedurally generated cities with procedurally generated buildings
  • -Procedurally generated dungeons
  • -Procedurally generated NPCs
  • -Procedural dialogue
  • -Character creation
  • -Modular crafting of weapons and armor
  • -Basic ass combat to be honest but we're i'm working on it

Planned features

  • -Questing System
  • -Faction System
  • -Procedural world history
  • -Procedural historical artifacts
  • -Procedural books
  • -Procedural gods and religion
  • -Crime  system
  • -Real estate and building mode
  • -Monsters and wild life
  • -Mounts
  • -Fantasy Races
  • -More biomes
  • -More dungeon types
  • -More weapon types
  • -Ranged weapons
  • -Martial skills
  • -Custom magic system
  • -Better 3D (programmer art goes brrrrrr)
